faqs.question: Will metal show when I smile?
faqs.answer: We design clasp positions and tooth shades to stay discreet. In some cases we can use tooth-coloured clasps; we’ll show you options before fitting.

faqs.question: Are chrome dentures heavy?
faqs.answer: They are usually lighter and slimmer than acrylic partials because the framework can be thinner. You’ll still need an adjustment period, which we support.

faqs.question: Do they damage teeth?
faqs.answer: Well-designed rests and clasps spread the load. We review supporting teeth carefully and adjust clasps so they’re secure without excessive pressure.

faqs.question: What if I need more stability later?
faqs.answer: We can revisit fit, clasp tension, or consider implant support if you want reduced movement. Any step is planned with your comfort and timeline in mind.
